comments: For an easy class, she definately makes it hard but the questions for the exams are the EXACT questions from the study guides and she practically does the HW for you if you ask for help.

She is very hard to understand. When teaching she moves way too fast when completing work in excel or access. Her grading scheme is ridiculous. This class is suppossed to be an easy a, but she takes it way to seriously and makes it harder than it should be.

TERRIBLE TEACHER! im in her class right now and she is extremely boring. hard to understand and she reads directly from the powerpoints. looking around the class i only see 3 people paying attention, everyone else is playing solitaire or other games, looking at cars, or sleeping. she is a bad teacher and very hard to understand (chinese accent).
